Dear Colleagues, The role of integrative, complementary, and alternative medicine (CAM) and traditional approaches to health are gaining popularity in healthcare. Therefore, this Special Issue of Healthcare aims to reflect the full breadth of the role of integrative approaches across different populations worldwide applied to a variety of disease and health conditions. Possible topics include but are not limited to: Cost-benefit and cost-effectiveness studies of integrative health interventions and approaches.
